tls:text.tls:srcline: 能含日月星辰大地山河，一切草木，惡人善人，惡法善法，天堂地獄，

tls:line.title: 南宗頓教最上大乘摩訶般若波羅蜜經六祖惠能大師於韶州大梵寺施法壇經 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Emptiness includes the sun, moon, stars, and planets, the great earth, mountains and rivers, all trees and grasses, bad men and good men, bad things and good things, heaven and hell;

sense.def: BUDDH: hell (the lowest of the Six Destinations, liùdào 六道, thought to be located somewhere underground); skr. naraka
